Data.Nat

{-# OPTIONS --safe #-}

module Data.Nat where

-- | Natural numbers.
data ℕ : Set where
  zero : ℕ
  suc  : ℕ → ℕ

{-# BUILTIN NATURAL ℕ #-}

Addition

-- | Addition of natural numbers.
_+_ : ℕ → ℕ → ℕ
zero  + n = n
suc m + n = suc (m + n)

-- | Multiplication of natural numbers.
_*_ : ℕ → ℕ → ℕ
zero  * n = zero
suc m * n = n + (m * n)
